title: So convenient for my Apple ecosystem at home
body: This was the one I was waiting for during the lock down period. My Beats Solo 3's cushion pad got spoiled and it was too difficult to use a wired one for my conferences, meetings, classes and chit chats with my friends. So, I had explored on all versions of Airpods and zeroed it on the least priced one that is AirPods 2 with charging case as I felt wireless charging doesn't make much of a sense and AirPod Pro's was beyond my budget. Noise cancellation is not much necessary for me as I usually do all the meetings and so on in my room at home. Only thing I wanted was the clarity and no noise productions at my end and at others end. This wonderful piece arrived one day earlier than expected. As usual well packed and professionally delivered by Amazon. Now it is almost 6 days of usage I am perfectly fine with it. So convenient to take the class and meetings. I can move around my house and it stays connected. Sound clarity is so good. iTunes, Spotify and my own classical music collection sound so good. Bass is so amazing. Sound quality is too good. Have used this for meetings in the last two days it’s so nice and convenient. Go for it!  One minor issue is that I found that in the right bud the seam is visible but the left bud is so nicely done that even the seam is not visible. I went to the net and saw that many were talking about this. This seems to be a common issue for the last few years. Apple means perfection so why did they allow this minor issue to exist even after few years is a big question. This is not a performance problem but an aesthetic issue. But I am ok with this...

title: Genuine Review Airpods(2nd Generation)
body: Reviewing it after 2 days of usage. I was quite uncertain about this product after reading a lot of bad reviews in amazon. Trust me do not go blindly with the reviews and do your own verification after you buy the product. I will list out the findings may be it could help other buyers too. 1. It is an original product. I can vouch for it after verifying about it on apple site by the serial number mentioned on the product. Also verified by other techniques which you can find on youtube easily. 2. Many reviewers told its not Airpod 2nd gen. I verified and it is Airpods 2. Firstly 'hey siri' feature is only on 2nd gen. So if that airpods listen your hey siri, it will respond. Also I was confused with the led mark on the case, so to clear that confusion it is only on wireless charging case only and not on the without wireless charging case. 3. On Android and Windows compatibility, let me say it won't behave the same way as it does on Apple devices, you have to connect it like bluetooth and it will perform well. I did my zoom meetings and connected with Laptop and Oneplus. It performed like a normal bluetooth earphones. You can't get the same functionality like in ear detection with the non apple devices, also when you take out one airpod it wont stop playing the music or pause it but in apple devices it does. The quality of sound and bass remains same.  I got the product from Appario Seller and it is genuine. No doubt about it. Got it at great price during Amazon Great Indian Festival.

title: Great product, fast delivery
body: I wanted this for more than a year but was not knowing how they will fit in the ear. Bit anyhow, bought it this time. The delivery was quick. Promised on 3rd day but delivered on 2nd day. The product was nicely packed and is original. AirPods works amazing. I have 2 iPhones with different Apple ID, it does not work with both at a time. If you connect to one Apple ID then the connection with other hets disconnected automatically. I think it ahould work with 2 devices with same ID. I dont have an iPad yet. Will check if it works and update. I really love the way Apple designs the product. So much detailing on minute things. I did not go for wireless cover because i dont intend to buy the wireless charger. Also the AirPods Pro, I hate the silicon attachments on the earphones. They block the ear too much and i feel very uncomfy. Overall, a great product!  UPDATE: 02.08.2020: The AirPods works great even with 2 iPhones with different Apple IDs. One you pick the call, just tap the 'Speaker' icon and then switch to 'Airpods'. Its a manual process, but takes half a second. So, its a great deal for me who bought the Airpods without knowing that I could use on 2 phones. Thank you Apple and thank you Amazon for fats delivery (1 day earlier than promised).

title: This is airpod 2. (2019) with wired charging case
body: After reading some of the bad reviews of the delivery of incorrect and/or damaged product, I was quite skeptical of placing the order for a while. But finally took the plunge and ordered it. And got the correct product.  Now there will be people who dont want to spend this kind of money on a headphone. Let me assure you, that now, with conference calling becoming a norm in these covid times, you will not regret this.  Crystal clear audio, seamless connectivity with devices (especially Apple devices) and Ease of wearing. if you are like me and do not like the ears blocked completely while talking. (I find it claustrophobic to do calls with ear buds blocking the ears. This is the best solution.  Airpods make it seem real worldy for the listener. And the sound quality on calls is just superb.  For music, as well its great. Unless you are seeking a thumping bass effect which you wont get here. But you get a great neutral effect and can hear all sounds in the music.

title: They do work like Magic. Awesome product.
body: Awesome product. I’m impressed with everything especially the battery life. I got them on 21st of July and since then i have charged them only three times. So battery is grt. And sound quality is very good as well. But the main thing is the convenience that you get from these. They work flawlessly with Apple devices. I use them with my iPhone XS. and they just work like magic. And hands free “Hey Siri” functionality is mind blowing. Although the left AirPod doesn’t fit my ear as perfectly as in the right one. In fact it kinda pains as well but that’s due to the shape of the ear canal. But i really got used to these and just love them. If u guys are looking to buy these. Don’t give it a second thought. Go for it. You won’t regret it. But there’s a little complaint that i have, is that the case of my AirPods had a little dust on it when i unboxed them for the first time. Maybe happened while they were being packed orginally. But the warranty is valid and product is genuine. That’s all that matters. There’s one more thing and that is very important as well, that i purchased these on 16/7/19 @ 12:30 am but the invoice updated by appario on site is 15/7/19. Which i had to get corrected from apple care by sending them the invoice copy which had 16/7/19 as order date. So after you get them make sure to get your warranty activated by calling apple care and showing them your invoice. Thnx a lot.

title: These are 2nd generation AirPods - CONFIRMED
body: I got these a couple of days back , went through some negatives reviews on Amazon before buying them so was a bit skeptical but once I got them, all doubts were cleared. Guys these are 2nd generation AirPods , if you have doubts, once u get them , go to Apple website and register them and you will see they are 2nd generation AirPods . 1st generation AirPods production was stopped once Apple released 2nd generation AirPods. So once u get the AirPods check for the production month , if it’s March 2019 and beyond , you don’t need to be worried abt it then. If still in doubt register them on Apple website and you will get your answer  Now coming to the AirPods - they are awesome - fit and sound is similar to the wired Apple headphones but it’s the convenience that you pay for. Added to that the Hey Siri feature is brilliant. Just say hey Siri and it answers your question. Battery life is fine I get through couple of days easy as I am a heavy earphone user - listening to music and answering the calls. For others it might last for 4-5 days also depending upon the use Overall a very good product - I got it for around 10,800 during the sale time which was a great deal

I tried them on myself and couldn't hear anything she was saying. From that time on, I started using these for myself. title: Amazing sound clarity. Definitely way better than any other option.
body: It has amazing sound clarity, with minimal lag you won't even notice. Charging capacity is also good, it sustains for a longer duration and gets charged instantly. Left & Right, both piece syncs fast. Using it with Apple devices, bring the best of it. The finger tap feature is also of great help. Switching between Apple Devices is very easy and fast. It detects ear-presence and your device behaves accordingly. Means if AirPods is connected but you picked the call through handheld device, then sound will come from device's microphone only, and as soon you place AirPods in your ear with ongoing call, the sound origin will automatically switch from device to AirPods.  Good point, that it can be used anywhere else, other than Apple devices. Means, even android device can pair with it.

title: Great headphones, works with Windows Laptops also
body: I will only talk about points that is not explicitly mentioned in other reviews. Initially I was little hesitant to buy as it, as I was not sure if this will connect to Windows laptop for calls. With increased working from home, it is important to have a good headphone which works well and connects to different types of devices. I have used this device to make calls on WEBEX, SLACK and ZOOM. The system used is Win 10. The other party did not complain about any disturbance in call quality.  Battery life is decent. Gives about 2 to 3 hours while on continuous calls. Charging with the case is very fast. 50% charge in 15 mins.

title: Loved using the Airpods
body: Loved the airpods! Thank you, Amazon, for proper delivery, and thank you, Apple, for the design of this device! The sound quality is really good considering it is a wireless Bluetooth device. Connectivity with iPhones is amazing, ofcourse, but it also connects smoothly with android devices. Also I am happy with the device fitting in the ears - it doesn’t hurt and it doesn’t fall off! The noise cancellation could have been better but I don’t mind hearing what’s happening around me! The device also makes it easy to take long calls since the hands aren’t occupied holding the phone and the shoulders don’t ache. Overall, a great combination with iPhones.

title: The best wireless headphones for your iPhone. Period.
body: I didn’t know how much I needed AirPods before I got them. I mostly use them to listen to music while working out or running. Now, I can focus solely on my workouts instead of adjusting/moving the wires all the time. The fit has never been an issue for me and they’ve never fallen out of my ear.  The best part is how fast and conveniently they connect to my phone. No painful pairing process every time I want to listen to music or talk on the phone.  I had the “Hey Siri” functionality disabled before getting them. It makes more sense to talk to her now more than ever.  The single tap and double tap gestures work flawlessly. I’ve been using these for quite a while now and I charge them once every 5 or 6 days. It will vary depending on your usage but it’s a battery champ.  The only reason why I wouldn’t recommend buying them is if you don’t have an iPhone. So, keep that in mind because most of the functionalities don’t work with androids.

body: Go buy any other earbuds and you'll never be as satisfied as you will be after using these. The noise cancellation works like a charm and you can attend all those calls with so much ease. They're compatible with android devices too so thats a great plus point. title: Genuine Product & Speedy Delivery
body: The product is completely 100% genuine, i.e., they are AirPods 2nd Gen. The LED light in front is only for the wireless charging model. But both, wired and wireless are available for 2nd Gen. For confirmation, look on the Apple box for model numbers. A2031/A2032 - This means they are 2nd Gen. models. Moreover, the same model numbers are printed on the AirPods too (just below the bulge). A2031 - Left AirPod A2032 - Right AirPod Also, obviously, if you want noise cancellation, look somewhere else. This is a different beast. One of the best things out there for you if you're already into the Apple ecosystem. The connectivity & features it offers with my iPhone and MacBook are unsurpassable.  I would like to add a very special thanks to Amazon for the delivery. The order was delivered 6 days prior to the date it was mentioned for in the tracking area. It came within 2 days. Now that's some speedy delivery!!

title: Too small but packs a lot of skill
body: Good product especially when you are in the apple ecosystem. It helps in syncing across various apple products. Sound quality is not bad at all however I rated it at four (4) as it lacks bass. Noise cancellation was not expected so one should not buy this if that is a key criteria. On the other hand it provides extreme ear comfort and can be used for long hours by working professionals. Battery life isnt bad either as long as you can use the case to recharge the pods in between the calls to keep it running. I get 6 hours talk time and 3 hours music time in a day .. others may get more.

title: 100% Genuine Product
body: I am writing this review based upon a lot of critics and negative review by many customer to tarnish the seller image. I owe almost all apple products and most of them ordered through Apparel, each time yet I have received Genuine product. Serial number, Purchase date and Warranty Expire date well verified on apple site. For those who want to check if the product is genuine or not , Go to setting<General<About <Airpod's . There you find serial number as well as firmware. DUplicate product you cant rename and either you see any information. 100 % Genuine product and quality offcourse apple never let us down with quality ! Well done amazon , delivery partner and seller !

title: Original air pods 2
body: This is an original air pods 2, does whatever it’s supposed to do very well if you have an iPhone. There are enough reviews out there you can check.  Thought to clear the air whether this is air pods 2 or not as even I was not clear initially.  This is air pods 2 - easiest way to check is the model number on the box - should be 2031 or 2032.  So why the confusion ? Reason is the charging case. Most video reviews show the pods with the wireless air pods charging case which has the led on the outside. However this case is not wireless charging and hence has the led on the inside. But the AirPods are 2 version.  Another way to check is they support Hey Siri. So that must work with them  Hope this helps some of you !!

title: More magical than ever.
body: The best thing about this is the seamless connection between iOS, WatchOS and MacOS devices. You won’t regret it if you have an Apple Eco-system. The Audio quality is better than the Apple in-the-box EarPods which comes with the iPhone box (till Aug 2020). Comparing it with other bluetooth devices the connection is superb because of the Bluetooth 5.0. Personally, I have never experienced a spotty connection when connected with iPhone. With Android Phones you do get the features, However it lacks the seamless connection and proper integration. Lastly, The battery is better. It exceeds my expectations.

title: #10on10 #VFM (Value for Money)
body: 1. Delivery was on time. Packaging was sufficiently good. 2. I was eagerly waiting for Android version of airpods. title: Best for Apple Ecosystem
body: Firstly, Airpods 2 are great. It hardly takes 2 sec to pair and the connection is stronger with compared to other Bluetooth Headsets. There are 3 distinctive features about Airpods you have to think about.  1. Convenience : If you use an iPhone or an iPad or MacBook or all of the above, then this is the best option ( comparing to Airpods Pro ) . The switching between devices is seamless and there is almost zero to none latency.  I own a iPhone 11 Pro and a MacBook Pro and an iPad. And the switch between them is so good that you will forget that you have any headphones on you.  2. Options: There are 3 versions of AIRPODS available. Airpods 2 with charging case, Airpods 2 with Wireless charging case and Airpods Pro. My first thought and confusion while buying Airpods was " Which one should I take ?" Should I go for Airpods 2 or Airpods Pro.  The simple answer is if you are worried about the fit of the Airpods in your ear and you have extra bucks to shell off... Go for AIRPODS PRO. But you are cost concerned and one of the lucky people whose ear perfectly fits the Earpods ( The Wired headphone in Box ), then go for AIRPODS 2 With Charging case. Please DO NOT opt for the one with Wireless charging case option unless you are already used to having wireless charging.  3. Sound, Noice cancellation & Daily use:  The sound is simply Bananas... Its crisp... its clear.... you have decent amount of bass ( Do Not expect same bass as a wired headphone ).  Noice Cancellation would be around 50-65 % of the Airpods Pro. But if you are someone who works in a loud environment , then go for Airpods Pro  The Daily use of Airpods 2 is very easy. Luckily for me, my right and left ears fit the Airpods perfectly granted the left one is a little loose. But till now they havent fallen of my ears when I move my head or go for a walk. There are situations where my ear starts to ache after a long 3 hours+ use. That can be fixed by getting a Airpods attachment available for around 190 bucks.  Bottom line, if you want a good, Apple compatible, good sounding and easy to handle wireless headphones, then go for Airpods 2 with Charging case. If you have extra money to shell off, then go for Airpods Pro.

title: Great buy
body: I bought it second time from Amazon and quality wise and reliability wise this product is awesome as previous one, experience is gud with this apple product but not with my apple pro(i also bought pro with 2nd generation this month), as i received fake/copy apple pro (authorized apple service center manager told me) ,and i m very disappointed with this..and the irony is कोई एक प्रोडक्ट फेक निकल जाये तो previous all happy experiences को भुलाया तो नही जा सकता ,लेकिन अब ऑनलाइन इतना महंगा और ऐसा प्रोडक्ट जिसे रिटर्न या रिप्लेस करने के लिए concern brand k service center से उसके fake या defective होने का certificate लेने जाना पडे और वो आपको ये कहकर आपको document provide ना करें कि ये product तो हमारी कम्पनी का है ही नही या उनके terms के according defective नही है ,तो सौ बार सोचना पडेगा कुछ भी ऐसा खरीदने से पहले ,कयूंकि apple service center manager told me himsel that plz don't buy apple products from Amazon coz people recieving fake/copy products (i captured/filmed this conversation when he told me all these) he even suggests me that u should buy from an apple store ,they are costly thn online but u will get 100% genuine product for sure. So guys beware and happy shopping.

title: Was a little confused
body: I bought these AirPods for ₹8990 After reading all the other reviews I guess I am lucky that I got a brand new sealed pack however I was under the impression that the AirPods gen 2 have an led indicator on the outer side of the case. These particular AirPods (the ones without wireless charging) have one on the inside which is pretty useless. There is also no noise cancelling in these AirPods but the I find the sound isolation they provide good for me. Connectivity is not a problem since I am an iPhone user and they work well with iPhones.  They come with a usb C to lightning cable which is pretty frustrating if you don’t have the adapter which in itself costs ₹2000. You cannot charge apple devices with other android chargers for some reason maybe because apple doesn’t care about the environment but act like they do.  Please check the model number of the box to confirm you have the right generation AirPods. It is A2032, A2031 for 2nd generation AirPods.  You are better off buying the Samsung buds which go for around ₹5000-6000 but apple is apple and people don’t buy their products because they are good, people buy them because an iPhone increases your aukaat more than a sarkari naukari.

title: AirPods gen 2 A2031
body: You can consider these original if you’re getting them from the seller “Appario retail pvt Ltd”. Indeed these are gen 2 airpods First thing to check if these are gen 1/2 is to go to “check coverage.apple.com” and key in the serial number on the box. If the site recognised these as AirPods gen 2, you’re good to go. If not, you just got ripped. In case you are not able to update your purchase date on apple’s website, install apple support app on your iPhone and then go to safari to check coverage.apple.com from where it will automatically route to support app and you can scan the serial number to double check authenticity as well as warranty Please do not go by blind feedbacks stating these are gen 1 AirPods. In any case also check the firmware of the AirPods. These should be “3A283” under the about section in settings.This is the latest firmware number for gen 2 and AirPods pros. If you still feel doubtful head over to a weighing scale and place the entire case with AirPods The AirPods themselves weigh 8 gms combined whereas the case by itself weighs 40 gms. Only go for these if you are looking for convenience. Do not expect to get “Bose” like quality output from these just because it’s expensive. These are made to work like a charm for apple devices although it will work just fine with non apple devices without the extra bells and whistles thanks to Bluetooth protocol. If your AirPods have firmware version 2D15... update them by placing both earbuds in case and closing it...then connect the case to the power adapter....and keep your iPhone close by to AirPods...wait for a minute or two...Your AirPods should now be updated to 3A283. If you’re not sure if these AirPods will fit your ears or not..just try to slip on apple’s wired EarPods...if they fit, then AirPods will also fit fine...if not you may have to buy extra 3rd party rubber tips to create a good seal for your ears ( in case you’re adamant on buyin these inspite of a bad fit) Overall just considering convenience, these are pretty good, but need to be handled with care and gentle hands...they are still made of plastic

title: Best companion of iPhone. No fear of warranty. Apple care will solve it very easily.
body: Best companion of iPhone. Product I received with warranty started around 3 months back. Contacted with apple customer support. They asked me to send the proof of purchase like invoice and warranty card sent by amazon. Once I submitted the same with apple they have changed the warranty starts date based on invoice date. No need to return it to amazon because of this issue. This happens with airpods purchased from any retailer. As this is not a device directly connect with network for activation like iPhone, it's warranty initially starts from the date when retailer purchase the product from apple for reselling. Once you contact apple over the phone they will easilly update it. No fear.
